Fairy Mai

Korean: 페어리 마이

South Korea

Group (2023):
eite until Aug 18, 2024

Introduction

Fairy Mai, also known by her birth name Sion, formerly known as Sia, is a South Korean singer under UNC Company. She is a former member of the girl group eite. She made her solo debut on March 17, 2025 with the collaboration single with KAIOS, "Lipstick".
